notes.text:
This update for podofo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20093: Fixed an invalid memory access that could cause an application
  crash (bsc#1159921).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad function in PdfVariant.h in PoDoFo 0.9.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file, because of ImageExtractor.cpp.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
